Title: Arctic Ocean Scene with Whale and Origami Boat
Description: A dramatic arctic or oceanic scene featuring a large blue whale diving into dark, icy waters. Below, turbulent seas with jagged ice floes. In the center, a pair of human hands hold a delicate origami boat, creating a contrast between vast nature and human creation.

Title: Winter Scene with Animals and Children
Description: A serene winter scene with a yellow-breasted bird perched on a bare branch, a large white rabbit in the snow, and three children bundled in winter clothing walking through the snow with a sled.

Title: Fantasy Urban Landscape with Eiffel Tower
Description: A fantasy or surreal urban landscape featuring the Eiffel Tower partially obscured by swirling purple and pink clouds. A figure with large dark purple wings descends from the clouds above a stylized futuristic cityscape.

Title: Flamingo Landscape Studies
Description: A detailed pencil sketch and vibrant colored painting of a dense tropical landscape with numerous flamingos. The top section features a monochromatic pencil sketch, while the middle section shows a vibrant colored painting of a similar scene with flamingos by water.

Title: White Lily Botanical Illustration
Description: A detailed botanical illustration of a white lily plant featuring two fully open blossoms and one prominent green bud, growing on a green stem with several dark green leaves. Realistic style resembling traditional botanical painting.

Title: Hand Reaching to Glowing Figure
Description: A painting depicting a large, pale hand reaching down towards a smaller, glowing, reclining human figure, all set against a dark, star-filled background. The hand appears almost divine, while the figure glows with golden-yellow light. Signed 'VIKTORIJA 09/2012'.

Title: Ballet Dancers in Rehearsal Studio
Description: An oil painting in impressionistic style depicting a bustling scene of ballet dancers in a rehearsal studio. Multiple female figures in white tutus are captured in various states of activity, with visible brushstrokes emphasizing movement and atmosphere. Signed 'CA 2013'.

Title: Portrait of a Contemplative Man
Description: A painted portrait of a middle-aged man with long flowing blond hair, rendered in an impressionistic style. The subject looks towards the upper right with a pensive expression, his left hand raised to his chin. The background features a two-toned blue and grey setting.

Title: Serene Harbor with Sailboats
Description: An oil painting depicting a serene harbor scene with several sailboats on calm water, backed by a distant shoreline with buildings and trees under an overcast sky. The style is impressionistic with loose, visible brushstrokes and a muted color palette of blues, greens, and greys.

Title: Watercolor Lily with Splattered Background
Description: A vibrant watercolor painting of a single large lily flower in shades of blue and purple with golden stamens, set against a dynamic background of pink and magenta watercolor washes accented with numerous dark red splatters.

Title: Women Washing Clothes by the Water
Description: An oil painting depicting a serene outdoor scene with several women engaged in washing clothes in a body of water. Eight women are distributed across the midground, standing or kneeling in the water. In the background, hazy mountains rise under a pale, overcast sky.

Title: Crushed Cans Stippling Drawing
Description: A black and white stippling (dot art) drawing depicting a still life of several crushed aluminum beverage cans. The artwork is rendered entirely using small black dots on a white background, with varying density creating shades of grey and black to define form, texture, and shadow.
